title: Light waves and their uses
brief_description: This elementary explanation of light deals with the following points: the principles of reflection with plane, concave, and convex mirrors; refraction in connection with lenses, with particular reference to the human eye; the principles and applications of interference; polar screens; the electro-magnetic spectrum; the quantum theory.
